segments.text: Will you be checking in any baggage today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have two large suitcases and one box .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you need baggage tags , they are found in the box on your right .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , thank you.They are already tagged with my name and address .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are allowed an additional two carry-on items .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good , I have my backpack and my camera tripod .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . All carry-on items must be able to fit under the seat or in the overhead bin .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Both my items will fit under the seat or in the overhead bin .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You will need to send the tripod as luggage because it is too long to fit in our gauge box for carry-on items .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I cannot let anything happen to that tripod.Can you guarantee it will not be damaged if I check it in ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I can't . Perhaps your stewardess will help you to find a place to store it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good idea . I will ask the stewardess to help me store my tripod .
segments.speaker: S2
